text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Cutting regs that were there 2 protect us on many levels, well of course you are. You've already shown U don't give a damn about The People when U ignored U.S. intel's repeated warnings since Nov 2019 about the seriousness of COVID19! So why would U give a damn about regs & us! https://t.co/YvCwMawTrY
